title: Digital Service Leader
description:
We are seeking a dynamic and visionary Digital Service Leader to spearhead two critical engineering functions dedicated to revolutionizing our operational and engineering efficiency. This strategic role involves leading a team focused on leveraging the Microsoft Power Platform to build productivity tools, and a second team dedicated to pioneering automation solutions using AI/ML, LLMs, and other emerging technologies.
   

  

 The ideal candidate is a hands\\-on technical leader with a strong software development background, a passion for innovation, and the ability to manage complex projects from ideation to deployment. You will be instrumental in shaping our digital strategy, mentoring talented engineers, and delivering high\\-impact solutions that drive business value.
   

  

**Leadership \\& Technical Guidance**
 Â¡ Lead, mentor, and grow two distinct teams of engineers: one focused on Business Operations tools development and the other on AI/ML Automation.
   

  

 Â¡ Provide expert technical guidance across the full software development lifecycle.
   

  

 Â¡ Foster a culture of innovation, collaboration, and continuous improvement, encouraging the exploration of emerging technologies.
   

  

 Â¡ Establish and maintain high standards for architecture, design, coding, testing, and deployment to ensure robust and scalable solutions.
   

  

* Business Operation Tool Development(Microsoft Power Platform):


 Â¡ Oversee the design, development, and maintenance of applications and dashboards using Microsoft Power Apps, Power BI, Power Automate, and SharePoint.
   

  

 Â¡ Work with internal teams to identify bottlenecks in engineering processes and develop tools to enhance efficiency and productivity.
   

  

 Â¡ Ensure seamless integration of Power Platform solutions with existing enterprise systems.
   

  

* Advanced Automation \\& Innovation (AI/ML \\& LLMs):


 Â¡ Lead the development of innovative solutions to automate complex engineering, process, and operational workflows using AI/ML, Large Language Models (LLMs), and data analytics.
   

  

 Â¡ Drive the conceptualization and creation of new tools that leverage emerging technologies to solve business challenges.
   

  

 Â¡ Stay at the forefront of advancements in AI and automation and champion their adoption within the organization.
   

  

* Project Delivery \\& Stakeholder Management:


 Â¡ Collaborate closely with cross\\-functional stakeholders to understand business requirements, define project scope, and establish priorities.
   

  

 Â¡ Manage the end\\-to\\-end project lifecycle, ensuring timely delivery of high\\-quality digital solutions.
   

  

 Effectively communicate project status, KPIs, risks, and outcomes to senior management and key stakeholders.
   

  

 Background
   

  

 Â¡ Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
   

  

 Â¡ 10\\+ years of experience in software development, with a proven track record of creating tools that improve business and operational efficiency.
   

  

 Â¡ 3\\-5 years of experience in a leadership or management role, with a demonstrated ability to lead technical teams.
   

  

 Â¡ Strong hands\\-on expertise with the Microsoft Power Platform (Power Apps, Power BI, Power Automate) and SharePoint. Solid understanding
   

  

 and practical experience with AI/ML concepts, tools, and frameworks.
   

  

 Â¡ Experience in implementing solutions using LLMs is highly desirable.
   

  

 Â¡ Excellent knowledge of software architecture, design patterns, and the full Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC).
   

  

 Â¡ Willingness and ability to be hands\\-on with the integration and deployment of tools as per project requirements.
   

  

 Â¡ Excellent communication and interpersonal skills for effective stakeholder coordination.

title: Detail Engineer â€“ Software (Robotics and Industrial Automation)
description:
**Job Title:** 
 â€ƒâ€ƒâ€ƒâ€ƒ Detail Engineer â€“ Software
   

  

**Location:** 
 â€ƒâ€ƒâ€ƒâ€ƒ Bangalore, India
   

  

**Experience:** 
 â€ƒâ€ƒ 3â€“4 Years
   

  

**Department:** 
 â€ƒ Product Development â€“ Robotics and Industrial Automation
   

  

**Reports to:** 
 â€ƒâ€ƒâ€ƒ Application Engineer (who reports to Product Development Head)
   

  

**Job Summary**
 A proactive and hands\\-on
 **Detail Engineer â€“ Software** 
 to support the development and implementation of control and automation software for robotic and industrial automation systems. This role involves PLC/HMI programming, software testing, system integration and documentation. Working closely with the Application Engineer, the candidate will contribute to building intelligent automation solutions including robotic arms, motion systems and digital control platforms. The ideal candidate will have strong experience in industrial software development, programming logic and on\\-ground commissioning.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
**Control Software Development:**
* Develop and implement PLC, HMI, and SCADA logic using platforms such as Siemens, Rockwell, Beckhoff, or B\\&R.
* Design software architecture and function blocks aligned with system requirements.
* Conduct simulation and logic testing for verification of control sequences.


**System Integration**
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams (mechanical, electrical, instrumentation) for seamless integration of software with hardware systems.
* Participate in I/O checks, device configuration, and communication setup.
* Support installation, FAT, SAT, and on\\-site commissioning activities.


**Documentation \\& Support**
* Prepare detailed documentation including logic diagrams, I/O lists, software manuals, and commissioning reports.
* Maintain version control of software releases and change logs.
* Provide feedback on control logic optimization and system performance.


**On\\-Ground Engineering Support**
* Assist during system bring\\-up, troubleshooting, and debugging during factory and site trials.
* Coordinate with vendors and internal teams for hardware\\-software interfacing and control system testing.


**Required Qualifications**
* Bachelorâ€™s degree in Electrical / Electronics / Mechatronics / Instrumentation / Computer Engineering.
* 3â€“4 years of experience in PLC/HMI software development for robotics, automation or special\\-purpose machines (SPMs).
* Proficient in programming industrial automation platforms (e.g., Siemens TIA Portal, Rockwell Studio 5000, Codesys).
* Understanding of control systems, motion control, and industrial communication protocols (e.g., Modbus, Profinet, Ethernet/IP).
* Exposure to industrial robotics, SCADA systems or vision systems is a plus.
* Strong team orientation, structured approach to problem\\-solving and ability to meet project timelines.

title: FullStack
description:

By leveraging artificial intelligence, technology, and innovative teaching methods, PPStack delivers future\\-ready skills and career empowerment for students, professionals, and organizations worldwide. Our diverse offerings include AI\\-powered e\\-learning platforms, crash courses, corporate training, career coaching, and technology consulting. With a mission to bridge the gap between education and industry, we provide tools and opportunities that drive transformation in education, careers, and digital growth. PPStack is trusted by learners globally, helping individuals and businesses thrive in a digital\\-first world.
   




**Role Description**

 This is a full\\-time, remote FullStack Developer role. The FullStack Developer will design, develop, and maintain scalable web applications while ensuring seamless front\\-end and back\\-end integration. Responsibilities include collaborating with cross\\-functional teams, writing clean and efficient code, troubleshooting and debugging, optimizing application performance, and staying updated with emerging technologies to implement innovative solutions. The role involves contributing to the end\\-to\\-end development cycle, participating in code reviews, and ensuring high\\-quality software delivery.

* Strong back\\-end development skills with experience using Node.js, Express, Python, or Java, and database technologies like MySQL, PostgreSQL, or MongoDB.
* Experience working with RESTful APIs, API integrations, and version control tools like Git.
* Knowledge of developing scalable and secure applications including deployment and hosting on cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud.
* Familiarity with full software development lifecycle, Agile methodologies, and CI/CD practices.

* Bachelorâ€™s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field, or equivalent practical experience.
* Experience with DevOps practices and tools is a plus.
* Strong communication skills and the ability to work effectively in a remote, collaborative environment.

description:
Join us as a Sr. Moodle Developer at Etech!
 




  






 Shift Timing: 5:30 PM to 2:30 AM IST
 











 What you will be doing:
 



* Develop, customize, and maintain Moodle plugins and themes as per business requirements.
* Optimize Moodle performance, ensuring scalability, security, and reliability.
* Develop and integrate new features into Moodle using Core PHP and MySQL.
* Troubleshoot and resolve Moodle\\-related technical issues.
* Collaborate with instructional designers, content developers, and system administrators to enhance the user experience.
* Implement third\\-party integrations and API customizations for Moodle.
* Ensure regular updates and security patches are applied to Moodle platforms.
* Maintain proper documentation of all development activities.



  






 What we expect to have:
 



* 3\\+ years of experience in Moodle development and customization.
* Strong expertise in Core PHP, Moodle plugin/theme development, and MySQL.
* In\\-depth knowledge of Moodle architecture, APIs, and database structure.
* Experience in customizing Moodle UI/UX for a better learning experience.
* Familiarity with SCORM, LTI, and xAPI standards.
* Experience with version control systems (Git, Bitbucket, etc.).
* Strong problem\\-solving skills and ability to debug complex issues.
* Knowledge of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and jQuery.
* Experience in deploying and managing Moodle on cloud environments (AWS, Azure, etc.) is a plus



  






 What We Offer:
 



* Canteen Subsidy
* Night Shift allowance as per process
* Schedule Attendance Bonus
* Health Insurance
* Tuition Reimbursement
* Incentive components campaign wise
* Work Life Balance Initiatives
* Rewards \\& Recognition



  






 Apply now and be part of our journey!

title: IICS
description:
A day in the life of an Infoscion
   

  

* As part of the Infosys delivery team, your primary role would be to interface with the client for quality assurance, issue resolution and ensuring high customer satisfaction.
* You will understand requirements, create and review designs, validate the architecture and ensure high levels of service offerings to clients in the technology domain.
* You will participate in project estimation, provide inputs for solution delivery, conduct technical risk planning, perform code reviews and unit test plan reviews.
* You will lead and guide your teams towards developing optimized high quality code deliverables, continual knowledge management and adherence to the organizational guidelines and processes.
* You would be a key contributor to building efficient programs/ systems and if you think you fit right in to help our clients navigate their next in their digital transformation journey, this is the place for you! If you think you fit right in to help our clients navigate their next in their digital transformation journey, this is the place for you!

title: Senior LLM/RAG Engineer (Legacy Modernization)
description:
The
 **LLM/RAG Engineer** 
 will play a pivotal role in a high\\-profile modernization project, transitioning a legacy RPG/IBM i\\-based Dealer Management System (DMS) into a modern, cloud\\-native Java architecture.
   

  

 In this Proof of Concept (POC) phase, you will specialize in
 **CodeRAG** 
 (Retrieval\\-Augmented Generation for code) and
 **Abstract Syntax Tree (AST)** 
 techniques. Your primary objective is to automate the parsing, transformation, and migration of legacy business logic into modern microservices. You will work at the intersection of Generative AI and legacy system modernization, ensuring that automated code generation remains accurate, performant, and aligned with architectural specifications.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Code Transformation \\& Analysis: Utilize AST techniques to parse legacy RPG code and transform it into structured formats suitable for automated migration.
* RAG Implementation: Design and maintain RAG pipelines using AWS Bedrock and Vector Databases to provide LLMs with high\\-fidelity context from legacy documentation and code analysis.
* Data Preprocessing: Clean, structure, and enrich metadata from legacy systems, potentially involving the creation of knowledge graphs or embeddings to improve LLM accuracy.
* Iterative Validation: Perform rigorous validation and correction of AI\\-generated code assets to ensure they meet modern Java standards and functional parity with the legacy system.
* Legacy Integration: Collaborate with specialized code analysis tools (such as PKS eXplain) to extract business logic and code flows from IBM i environments.
* Collaboration \\& Documentation: Work closely with cross\\-functional teams in India and Germany, documenting complex business logic and ensuring tight feedback loops during the POC.
* Quality Assurance: Adhere to strict architectural specifications and collaborate on testing strategies to validate the migrated solution.


**Requirements**
* Total Work Experience: Minimum of 4â€“8 years of experience in software engineering, with a significant focus on AI/ML or Backend development.
* AI \\& LLM Expertise: Proven experience working with advanced LLMs (e.g., Claude 3\\.5/3\\.7/4\\) and building RAG pipelines.
* Technical Proficiency: \\* Languages: Strong proficiency in Python.
+ Cloud: Hands\\-on experience with AWS Bedrock.
+ Databases: Experience with Vector Databases such as Milvus or Pinecone.

* Code Transformation Skills: Deep understanding of Abstract Syntax Trees (AST) and experience in parsing or transforming code programmatically.
* Modernization Knowledge: Familiarity with code migration processes, microservices architecture, and cloud\\-native design patterns.
* Tools \\& Version Control: Expert\\-level knowledge of Git for managing generated code and collaborative development.
* Soft Skills: A proactive nature with strong communication skills, essential for navigating the ambiguity of a POC environment and working with distributed global teams.


**We offer**
* Opportunity to work on bleeding\\-edge projects
* Work with a highly motivated and dedicated team
* Competitive salary
* Flexible schedule
* Benefits package \\- medical insurance, sports
* Corporate social events
* Professional development opportunities
* Well\\-equipped office


**About Us**
 Grid Dynamics (NASDAQ: GDYN) is a leading provider of technology consulting, platform and product engineering, AI, and advanced analytics services. Fusing technical vision with business acumen, we solve the most pressing technical challenges and enable positive business outcomes for enterprise companies undergoing business transformation. A key differentiator for Grid Dynamics is our 8 years of experience and leadership in enterprise AI, supported by profound expertise and ongoing investment in data, analytics, cloud \\& DevOps, application modernization and customer experience. Founded in 2006, Grid Dynamics is headquartered in Silicon Valley with offices across the Americas, Europe, and India.

title: Flutter SDE Internship
description:
**Company Description**

 DEV SEC IT provides integrated solutions to help organizations design, secure, and manage digital systems that are scalable and resilient. By embedding security and compliance throughout the technology lifecycle, DEV SEC IT ensures organizational innovation without sacrificing protection. The companyâ€™s expertise includes application development, cybersecurity, cloud operations, and DevSecOps methodologies that integrate security into CI/CD pipelines. DEV SEC IT also offers services in modernizing legacy systems, migration to cloud environments, and optimizing operations using automation tools. With a focus on collaboration, the company delivers tailored solutions that improve efficiency, ensure compliance, and mitigate risks.
   




**Role Description**

 This is a remote internship role for a Flutter Software Development Engineer (SDE) Intern. The successful candidate will contribute to application development using Flutter, participate in backend development, and engage in coding projects that align with the companyâ€™s secure development practices. Additional responsibilities include collaborating with team members, implementing Object\\-Oriented Programming principles, and adhering to project timelines and deliverables.
   




**Qualifications**
* Proficiency in Computer Science fundamentals, including algorithms and data structures
* Understanding of Back\\-End Web Development and Software Development processes
* Experience with Programming in relevant languages and frameworks
* Knowledge of Object\\-Oriented Programming (OOP) principles
* Strong problem\\-solving skills and a proactive approach to learning
* Passion for software development and a willingness to work collaboratively
* Experience with secure coding practices or mobile application development is a plus
* Pursuing or recently completed a degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field
